text: Ningĩ athuuri acio, o na andũ arĩa othe maikarĩte hau kĩhingo-inĩ, makiuga atĩrĩ, “Tũrĩ aira. Jehova arotũma mũndũ-wa-nja ũcio ũroka gwaku mũciĩ atuĩke o ta Rakeli na Lea, andũ-a-nja arĩa eerĩ maakire nyũmba ya Isiraeli.4:11 Andũ a Isiraeli moimire harĩ Rakeli na Lea. Daudi na Solomoni maatuĩkire a rũciaro rwa Ruthu. Ũromenyeka kũu Efiratha, na ũgĩe igweta inene kũu Bethilehemu.
